alert.note: Alert for Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 5:12PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of southern Hamilton, west central Warren, northern Fulton, northwestern Saratoga and central Herkimer Counties through 545 PM EST... At 511 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds 7 miles northeast of Ohio, or 21 miles south of Old Forge, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Ohio, Lake Pleasant, Wells, Day Center, Moffitt Beach Campground, Sacandaga Campground, Harrisburg, Hope, Arietta, Benson, Girards Sugarbush, Nobleboro, Tenantville, Whitehouse, Knappville, Shaker Place, Hoffmeister, West Day and Gray. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Southern Herkimer
